verses.verse: Peter <S%G4074><s%>, an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, to the elect who are sojourners <S%G3927><s%> of the Dispersion in <S%G1290><s%> Pontus <S%G4195><s%>, Galatia <S%G1053><s%>, Cappadocia <S%G2587><s%>, Asia <S%G773><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Bithynia <S%G1588><s%>,

according to <S%G2596><s%> the foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sprinkling <S%G4473><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> be multiplied <S%G4129><s%>.

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> begat <S%G313><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> again <S%G313><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a living <S%G2198><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>,

unto <S%G1519><s%> an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> incorruptible <S%G862><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled <S%G283><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that fadeth not away <S%G263><s%>, reserved <S%G5083><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> are guarded <S%G5432><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a salvation <S%G4991><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to be revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>.

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> ye greatly rejoice <S%G21><s%>, though now <S%G737><s%> for a little while <S%G3641><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> need be <S%G1163><s%>, ye have been <S%G2076><s%> put to grief <S%G3076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> manifold <S%G4164><s%> trials <S%G3986><s%>,

that <S%G2443><s%> the proof <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, being more <S%G4183><s%> precious <S%G5093><s%> than gold <S%G5553><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> perisheth <S%G622><s%> though <S%G1161><s%> it is proved <S%G1381><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>, may be found <S%G2147><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> having <S%G1492><s%> seen <S%G1492><s%> ye love <S%G25><s%>; on <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%>, though now <S%G737><s%> ye see <S%G3708><s%> him not <S%G3361><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> believing <S%G4100><s%>, ye rejoice <S%G21><s%> greatly with joy <S%G5479><s%> unspeakable <S%G412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> full of glory <S%G1392><s%>:
receiving <S%G2865><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, even the salvation <S%G4991><s%> of <S%G5590><s%> your souls <S%G5590><s%>.

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> sought <S%G1567><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> searched diligently <S%G1830><s%>, who prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that should come unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>:

searching2045, 1519 what <S%G5101><s%> time or <S%G2228><s%> what manner of <S%G4169><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> did point <S%G1213><s%> unto <S%G4303><s%>, when it testified beforehand the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the glories <S%G1391><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> should follow them <S%G3326><s%>.

To whom <S%G3739><s%> it was revealed <S%G601><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> unto you <S%G2254><s%>, did they minister <S%G1247><s%> these things <S%G846><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> have been <S%G312><s%> announced <S%G312><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5209><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> sent forth <S%G649><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; which things <S%G3739><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> to look <S%G3879><s%> into <S%G1519><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> girding up <S%G328><s%> the loins <S%G3751><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind <S%G1271><s%>, be sober <S%G3525><s%> and set your hope <S%G1679><s%> perfectly <S%G5049><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is to be brought <S%G5342><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of obedience <S%G5218><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> fashioning yourselves according to <S%G4964><s%> your former <S%G4386><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the time of your <S%G5216><s%> ignorance <S%G52><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> like <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> he who called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%>, be <S%G1096><s%> ye <S%G846><s%> yourselves also holy <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> manner of living <S%G391><s%>;
because <S%G1360><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Ye <S%G1096><s%> shall be holy <S%G40><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> holy <S%G40><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye call on <S%G1941><s%> him as Father <S%G3962><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> without respect of persons <S%G678><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%>'s work <S%G2041><s%>, pass <S%G390><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> sojourning <S%G3940><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>:

knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye were <S%G3084><s%> redeemed <S%G3084><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> with corruptible things <S%G5349><s%>, with silver <S%G694><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> gold <S%G5553><s%>, from <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%> manner of life <S%G391><s%> handed down from your fathers <S%G3970><s%>;
but <S%G235><s%> with precious <S%G5093><s%> blood <S%G5613><s%>, as of a lamb <S%G286><s%> without spot <S%G784><s%>, <S%G299><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

who was foreknown <S%G4267><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the end <S%G2078><s%> of times <S%G5550><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sake <S%G5209><s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are believers <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him846, 1453 from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>; so that <S%G5620><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Seeing ye have purified <S%G48><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your obedience <S%G5218><s%> to the truth <S%G225><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%> love of the brethren <S%G5360><s%>, love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> fervently <S%G1619><s%>:

having been begotten again <S%G313><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> seed <S%G4701><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of incorruptible <S%G862><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, which liveth <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%>.

For <S%G1360><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is as <S%G5613><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> thereof <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> of grass <S%G5528><s%>. The grass <S%G5528><s%> withereth <S%G3583><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G846><s%> flower <S%G438><s%> falleth <S%G1601><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of good tidings which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2097><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.
